metadata.name: Home Sweet Home #1/26
metadata.description:
Abrams is a fictional character that I created based on my personal life experience.
It's all based on my life, I've been on a really desperate moment back then in 2016 and really want to be free like a ghost.
Long short in my 3rd attempt to do that , ill figure it out something really interesting i was thinking ‚ÄúYou don't have to die to be a ghost‚Äù and through my imagination, i start doing photoshoots using a white robe and here we are now ‚Äúabrams‚Äùüëª‚ú®
